titleStmt.title: The bloodie banquet A tragedie. By T.D.
titleStmt.author: T. D.
Drue, Thomas, fl. 1616-1653, attributed name.
Barker, Thomas, fl. 1620, attributed name.
Davenport, Robert, fl. 1623, attributed name.
Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632, attributed name.
Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Thomas Drue, to Thomas Barker, to Robert Davenport, and to Thomas Dekker and Thomas Middleton.
Running title reads: The bloody banquet.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Michigan. Library.
